thread.title: Woman found stabbed to death in Washington Park home
thread.title_full: Woman found stabbed to death in Washington Park home - Chicago Tribune

author: Peter Nickeas
title: Woman found stabbed to death in Washington Park home
text:
A woman in her 80s was found stabbed inside her burning home early Monday morning, according to authorities.
The woman was pronounced dead at University of Chicago hospital, according to police and fire officials.
Emergency crews responded to a fire in the 5100 block of South Michigan Avenue about 2:50 a.m. and fire crews found the woman during their search of the first floor, authorities said.
A second person, a man whose age wasn't available, was taken to the same hospital to be treated for smoke inhalation injuries. He's in good condition, authorities said.
Check back for more information.
